actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude certain mission societies and their missionary members from social security taxes.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code and title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to exclude certain mission societies and their missionary members from social security taxes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude certain mission societies and their missionary members from social security taxes.
